@PixPerk_
7/6/2025, 4:09:48 PM
tldrs in action. -a rust cli that writes a readme for your codebase. - you can also enable streaming to watch it get written live, line-by-line as the ai thinks. - install : cargo install tldrs - supports custom prompts via file or flag docs : https://t.co/gY2UYJXDdo https://t.co/Y7q2tKP0hL

@PixPerk_
7/11/2025, 1:17:49 PM
how i build projects: 1. sketch the idea + architecture 2. define domain models first (structs, classes) 3. build core logic, no side effects (impl, methods) 4. add interfaces/traits 5. slowly add infra: db, api, etc 6. optimize and refactor (minimal) and then it is all vibes
